benchmark_details.name: MultiAgentBench
benchmark_details.overview: MultiAgentBench is a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate LLM-based multi-agent systems across diverse, interactive scenarios, focusing on collaboration, competition, and coordination.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLM-based multi-agent collaboration and competition in various scenarios.

data.source: Curated multi-agent tasks adapted from existing workloads and LLM-generated tasks with human verification.
data.size: 100 test cases per task across 6 diverse scenarios.
data.annotation: Manually annotated and automatically verified by agents.

methodology.calculation: Metrics computed based on agent interactions and task completion rates.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicate effectiveness in collaboration and task completion.
methodology.validation: Model performances compared against traditional benchmarks.
